Latest Questions about BSNL Recharge Plans

How to tansfer Talktime from one BSNL to another BSNL number?

To transfer balance from BSNL follow the steps: First, you need to register your phone number: REGISTER PTOP send to 54455. Then you will receive a password by SMS. After that type "GIFTMobile NumberAmount>" and send to 53733 or 53738. Ex:- "GIFT 9430412308 20" You will receive a confirmation message.

How to take the Talktime loan on BSNL?

Taking talktime loan on BSNL You can take talktime load by using USSD Codes Simply Type "Credit" and Send it to "53738". You will receive Rs 10 talktime loan. Note:- To avail this service your SIM needs to be minimum 90 days old and if you recharge your phone within 24 hours Rs10 will be deducted from your account but If you recharge your phone after 24 hours then Rs 11 will be deducted from your account.
